void *sum_front(void *ignored_argument) {
    int sum = 0;
    for (int i = <span data-fragment-index="3" class="fragment custom myem-only">0</span>; i &lt; <span data-fragment-index="3" class="fragment custom myem-only">512</span>; ++i) { sum += values\[i]; }
    <span data-fragment-index="4" class="fragment custom myem-only">results[@303@] = sum;</span>
    return NULL;
}
void *sum_back(void *ignored_argument) {
    int sum = 0;
    for (int i = <span data-fragment-index="3" class="fragment custom myem-only">512</span>; i &lt; <span data-fragment-index="3" class="fragment custom myem-only">1024</span>; ++i) { sum += values\[i]; }
    <span data-fragment-index="4" class="fragment custom myem-only">results[@313@] = sum;</span>
    return NULL;
}
int sum_all() {
    pthread_t sum_front_thread, sum_back_thread;
    /* missing: error handling */
    pthread_create(&amp;sum_front_thread, NULL, sum_front, NULL);
    pthread_create(&amp;sum_back_thread, NULL, sum_back, NULL);
    pthread_join(sum_front_thread, NULL); pthread_join(sum_back_thread, NULL);
    return <span data-fragment-index="4" class="fragment custom myem-only">results[0] + results[1]</span>;
}
